Row.Text: +20% [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength in Friendly Lands for Military Units purchased with [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+25 XP for all Units.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must have an Armory.
+20% [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength in Friendly Lands for Military Units trained in this city.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+25 XP for all Units.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must have an Armory.
+20% [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength in Friendly Lands for Military Units trained in this city.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+15 XP for all Units.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must have an Armory.

The Kaserne is the unique Military Academy replacement for Switzerland. It grants any unit trained in the city the 'Swiss Guard' promotion, increasing their combat strength in friendly lands. It also comes slightly earlier than the Military Academy, at Metallurgy.
Hans Konrad von Escher vom Luchs
Josef Karl Xaver Leopold Leodegar Amrhyn
Josef Karl Xaver Leopold Leodegar Amrhyn
Josef Karl Xaver Leopold Leodegar Amrhyn II

Language_en_US.Row:
The Kaserne is the unique Military Academy replacement for Switzerland. It grants any unit purchased in the city with gold the 'Swiss Guard' promotion, increasing their combat strength in friendly lands. It also comes slightly earlier than the Military Academy, at Flintlock. </Row
The Kaserne is the unique Military Academy replacement for Switzerland. It grants any unit trained in the city the 'Swiss Guard' promotion, increasing their combat strength in friendly lands. It also comes slightly earlier than the Military Academy, at Flintlock.
The Combat Medic is a unique combat unit available only to Switzerland. It is unlocked at Humanism and does not replace any standard unit. Although it may only be used to defend, the Combat Medic heals itself and any adjacent Military Units each turn. In addition, the Combat Medic ignores enemy Zone of Control when moving.
Our people are now stowing their savings into your banks and buying your luxury chocolates. I worry the rest of the world will also succumb to the influence of your culture.
Implement Bank Secrecy Laws
Switzerland's reputation for the privacy of her banks is foremost. However, some have accused us of laundering the riches of tax evaders and criminals, and they demand that we make our banking more transparent. This will not stand, and new laws must be put in place to protect the privacy of our clientele.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Switzerland [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must have researched Banking [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Banks produce an additional +15% [ICON_GOLD] Gold in cities and +1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness
Switzerland's reputation for the privacy of her banks is foremost. However, some have accused us of laundering the riches of tax evaders and criminals, and they demand that we make our banking more transparent. This will not stand, and new laws must be put in place to protect the privacy of our clientele.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Banks produce an additional +15% [ICON_GOLD] Gold in cities and +1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness
In response to accusations of laundering the riches of criminals, Switzerland has enacted new banking laws to further protect the privacy of their clientele.
Fund Foreign Researchers
Good research heeds not creed, nor sex, nor race; it cares only for the rational. Knowing this, we should heed the research done by foreign scientists and invite them into our open society.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Switzerland [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted from the beginning of the Renaissance Era [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Gold} [ICON_GOLD] Gold [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 {2_ResourceDesc} [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Research Agreements yield 50% more [ICON_RESEARCH] Science when completed
Good research heeds not creed, nor sex, nor race; it cares only for the rational. Knowing this, we should heed the research done by foreign scientists and invite them into our open society.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Research Agreements yield 50% more [ICON_RESEARCH] Science when completed
Switzerland has invited foreign scientists to partake in their scientific research.
A local company in the city of {1_City} has invented a very promising, highly versatile combat knife!
Promising Student
A promising young student has recently come to our attention. Well-versed in the mathematic sciences, the student would do well in the service of our government. We should find a place for them.[NEWLINE]
He should be put to use in the Military.
He should be put to use in Communications.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]All current Military Units gain +5 XP[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]All current Military Units gain +1 Sight[ENDCOLOR]
We have employed a promising student into the military.
We have employed a promising student into communications technology.
Conservative Coup
A conservative coup d'etat against the liberal government of {1_CityName} has taken place! The conservative leaders in charge of the coup have pledged to overthrow any and all governments that would threaten the current religious order. We need to deal with this matter before it spreads throughout the country.[NEWLINE]
We must have the perpetrators thrown in jail!
We should concede to whatever demands the conservatives have.
We should pay off all those involved.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]The city of {1_CityName} undergoes two turns of [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]The [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital undergoes one turn of [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[ENDCOLOR]
We have imprisoned the perpetrators of a coup in {1_CityName}, causing unrest amongst the conservatives of the city.
We have conceded to the demands of the conservatives, causing unrest in the capital.
We have bribed everyone involved in the coup in {1_CityName}, settling all disputes for the time being.
Mrs. Dufour
